mainPageEd.title: Comprehensive Educational Materials
mainPageEd.text: Explore a vast library of resources, including materials and books for UNT preparation, school textbooks from Algrebra of 5th grade, to History of Kazakhstan of 11th!

mainPageTesting.title: Interactive Testing
mainPageTesting.text: Access our extensive database of tests to evaluate and enhance your knowledge. Get instant feedback and track your progress.

mainPageChat.title: Meet Your Virtual Teacher
mainPageChat.text: Our AI-powered virtual teacher is here to answer all your educational queries. Whether it's a complex math problem or a historical fact, we've got you covered.

mainPageForum.title: Join the Community Forum
mainPageForum.text: Connect with fellow students, share experiences, ask questions, and find answers. Be part of a vibrant learning community.

mainPageAbout.title: Want to Know More About Us?
mainPageAbout.text: Learn about our mission, vision, and the team behind Tüs In. Discover how we are transforming education in Kazakhstan with cutting-edge AI technology.

mainPageBottom.available: Available languages at the website so far:

login.title: Welcome
login.subtitle: We are glad to see you back with us

slide1.title: AI Curriculum Customization
slide1.text: Tailored learning experiences are at your fingertips with AI-driven educational tools. Every student can thrive, gaining personalized instruction tailored to their strengths and learning pace. There's much to gain and nothing to lose.

slide2.title: Collaborative Learning
slide2.text: AI not only supports individual learning but also enhances group study dynamics. It facilitates more effective peer-to-peer interactions and collaborative projects, maximizing the educational benefits for all participants.

slide3.title: Interactive Learning
slide3.text: Engage with dynamic, AI-powered modules that transform traditional classroom settings into interactive learning environments. Enhance your understanding and retention of complex subjects with technology designed for educational success.

footer.title: INNOVATIVE. ADAPTIVE. EMPOWERING.
footer.text: We're a forward-thinking team dedicated to revolutionizing education with AI. Our mission is to provide tailored, data-driven learning experiences that adapt to each student's unique needs. Join us on this journey to transformeducation and unlock your full potential.
